name: Is the Order a Rabbit Hole?
name_original: Is the Order a Rabbit Hole?
description:
A game which the characters in it are based on an anime with title "Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka?" (ご注文はうさぎですか？, Is the Order a Rabbit?)
Play your way as a ~rabbit~ through several 'chasing' action, or rather it is being 'chased', by several cute girls.
This game consists of 40 "Rabbit Holes" and some 'extras' to play.
And reveal the mystery of your existence in that world by completing a certain amount of rabbit holes.

This was released at March 31st, 2016 on GameJolt : https://gamejolt.com/games/is-the-order-a-rabbit-hole/137489
